sqlMap.select: SELECT a.product_code "productCode", b.prem_status "premInfo.premStatus", c.description "premInfo.premStatusDesc", a.base_sum_ins "baseSumIns", b.frequency "premInfo.frequency", d.description || 'ç¼´' "premInfo.frequencyDesc", b.period_prem_sum "premInfo.periodPremSum", b.pay_to_date "premInfo.payToDate", e.client_name "insuredName" FROM policy_product a, policy_product_prem b, prem_status c, frequency d, client_information e WHERE a.policy_no = b.policy_no(+) AND (b.prod_seq IS NULL OR a.prod_seq = b.prod_seq) AND b.prem_status = c.prem_status(+) AND b.frequency = d.frequency(+) AND a.insured_no = e.client_no(+) AND a.policy_no = #value# ORDER BY a.prod_seq
